attributes.action: ignore European Law which wishes to remove restrictions on animal quarantine and allow free movement of animals in and out of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We in the UK have enjoyed a rabies free society since 1897.  By bringing the UK into line with Europe we will be allowing the return of rabies to this country.

The fact that we have a natural barrier (English Channel) helps prevent wild animals from bringing Rabies and other diseases into this country.  

Should we allow the EU to ignore the fact that we have kept rabies out for 100+years??
